column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Yon Rha says : " Nobody sneaks up on me without getting burned ! "
#Text=Zuko says : " We were n't behind the bush .
#Text=Take whatever you want .
#Text=I 'll cooperate .
#Text=" Katara says : " Do you know who I am ?
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " No .
#Text=I 'm not sure .
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh , you better remember me like your life depends on it !
#Text=Why do n't you take a closer look ?
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " Yes , yes , I remember you now .
#Text=You 're that little Water Tribe girl .
#Text=" Kya says : " Just let her go and I 'll give you the information you want .
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " You heard your mother .
#Text=Get out of here !
#Text=" Young Katara says : " Mommy , I 'm scared .
#Text=" Kya says : " Go find your dad , sweetie .
#Text=I 'll handle this .
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " Now tell me , who is it ?
#Text=Who 's the waterbender ?
#Text=" Kya says : " There are no waterbenders here .
#Text=The Fire Nation took them all away a long time ago .
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " You 're lying .
#Text=My source says there 's one waterbender left in the Southern Water Tribe .
#Text=We 're not leaving until we find the waterbender !
#Text=" Kya says : " If I tell you , do you promise to leave the rest of the village alone ?
#Text=It 's me .
#Text=Take me as your prisoner .
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " I 'm afraid I 'm not taking prisoners today ... " Katara says : " She lied to you !
#Text=She was protecting the last waterbender !
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " What ?
#Text=Who ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Me !
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " I did a bad thing !
#Text=I know I did and you deserve revenge , so why do n't you take my mother ?
#Text=That would be fair !
#Text=" Katara says : " I always wondered what kind of person could do such a thing , but now that I see you , I think I understand .
#Text=There 's just nothing inside you , nothing at all .
#Text=You 're pathetic and sad and empty .
#Text=" Yon Rha says : " Please , spare me !
#Text=" Katara says : " But as much as I hate you ... I just ca n't do it .
#Text="
